2.name: Fire Shield
2.description: Puts up a fire-infused shield, protecting the user and dealing damage to any who dare attack them.

3.name: Rage
3.description: Builds up rage within ones-self, increasing [color=red]attack[/color], while decreasing [color=blue]defense[/color].

4.name: Arcane Destruction
4.description: Fires a burst of arcane energy, devastating any who are hit.

5.name: Dark Aegis
5.description: Completely nullifies all damage taken, until the effect wears off, where all the damage nullified is dealt.

6.name: Soothing Sunlight
6.description: Beams down the warmth of the sun on a target, [color=green]healing[/color] them.

7.name: Growth
7.description: Infuses an ally with regeneration, causing them to [color=green]heal[/color] with every turn that passes.

8.name: Magnetism
8.description: Magnetises your weapon, causing it to lower the defense of any foe hit by it.

9.name: Supercalifrageliciousexpialidotious
9.description: An arcane chant that causes a variety of [color=blue]effects[/color]. It first enchants your weapon with pumpkins, causing foes hit by basic attacks to become disoriented. Next, it enchants the user with [color=red]Freshness[/color], causing all foes to have a change of being charmed each turn, with the chance of being charmed increasing with each turn that passes. Lastly it has a really long description, just to test the limits of this tiny description box.
